text:
You can use custom form for all the calculations and then pass data through Form API

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form|https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form>

The only drawback in this approach is form won't be editable but generally this kind of forms dont need to edit frequently.
if you're using jQuery, you need to trigger a change after updating the value
